item.title: About vex in houdini
item.description: VEX is a so called SIMD architecture ( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SIMD) (Single instructions, multiple Data). In basic terms that means the code is not run line by line, but kind of “at once” at the end (because it’s faster that way).
